======================================================================

**Portfolio:** $100,000

## REASONING
The decision to modify our position in Walmart (WMT) at 1.51% reflects a calculated approach to capitalize on the company's strong earnings momentum and operational efficiencies, despite the prevailing bearish sentiment. This strategic adjustment positions us to leverage potential upside while maintaining prudent risk management.
